      void testCalculateWidths()
      Tests whether the column widths are correctly returned.
      void testCalculateWidthsTotalWidthTooSmall()
      Tests that column widths cannot become negative if the total width is too small.
      void testColumnSizeUpdatesWithPrecision()
      Tests whether a series of updates of column sizes does not lead to major rounding errors.
      void testGetColumnCount()
      Tests whether the correct number of columns is returned.
      void testGetNumberOfColumnsWithPercentWidth()
      Tests whether the number of columns with a percent width is correctly returned.
      void testGetNumberOfColumnsWithPercentWidthFixedOnly()
      Tests initialization of the controller if there are no columns with relative width.
      void testGetOriginalFixedWidth()
      Tests whether the fixed with is correctly returned.
      void testGetOriginalFixedWidthUndefined()
      Tests whether the original fixed width of a column can be queried if it is undefined.
      void testGetPercentValue()
      Tests whether the correct percent values are returned.
      void testGetPercentValueAdjust()
      Tests the adjustment of percent values if the sum is less than 100.
      void testGetPercentValueAdjustUndefined()
      Tests whether remaining percent values are added to undefined values.
      void testGetPercentValueUndefined()
      Tests whether the percent value can be queried if it is undefined.
      void testIsPercentWidth()
      Tests whether the correct percent width flags are returned.
      void testNewInstanceDuplicateWidthSpec()
      Tests whether a column is detected that has both a fixed and a relative width.
      void testNewInstanceMoreThan100Percent()
      Tests whether percent values that sum up to more than 100 are detected.
      void testNewInstanceNull()
      Tries to create a new instance without a tag.
      void testNewInstancePercentWidthNegative()
      Tests whether a negative percent width is detected.
      void testNewInstancePercentWidthTooLarge()
      Tests whether a percent width that is too big is detected.
      void testRecalibrate()
      Tests a successful recalibration of the column widths.
      void testRecalibrateNoRemainingPercentWidth()
      Tests recalibrate() if all percent columns have a width of 0.
      void testRecalibrateNull()
      Tries to call recalibrate() with a null parameter.
      void testRecalibrateWrongElementCount()
      Tries to call recalibrate() with an array that has the wrong number of elements.
